note:
Sixty-something Tango obsessed Welsh Witch.
Mainly posting about my passion : Argentine Tango/Salon Tango. Encouraging others to dance for their well being and fitness. I am a retired business professional and former teacher/lecturer now fully engaged with living my best life, immersed in nature in a rural setting in Wales UK. Other interests include two Yorkshire Terriers, growing fruit, vegetables and flowering plants, shrubs and trees. Family and friends are foremost in my existence.

fields.name: Hates
fields.value: Waste, Robbing poor to pay the rich
